headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Director Mode
content:
The Rockstar Editor features Director Mode, offering a range of tools to help you create truly unique videos.

Before recording your gameplay, launch Director Mode to choose from a huge cast of Story Mode characters and animals, define variables such as the weather, time of day, location, and even apply cheats such as explosive punches.

Find Director Mode in the Rockstar Editor tab of the Pause Menu.
